art

Class DTrackFlystick

  • java.lang.Object
    • art.DTrackFlystick

  • public class DTrackFlystick
extends java.lang.Object
    A.R.T Flystick data (6DOF + buttons).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DTrackFlystick(int id)
      Constructor for not tracked Flystick.
      protected DTrackFlystick(int id, double quality, int[] button, double[] joystick, double[] loc, double[][] rot)
      Constructor for tracked and not tracked Flystick.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DTrackFlystick

        protected DTrackFlystick(int id)
        Constructor for not tracked Flystick.
        Parameters:
        id - ID number (starting with 0)

      • DTrackFlystick

        protected DTrackFlystick(int id,
                         double quality,
                         int[] button,
                         double[] joystick,
                         double[] loc,
                         double[][] rot)
        Constructor for tracked and not tracked Flystick.
        Parameters:
        id - ID number (starting with 0)
        quality - Quality (0 ≤ qu ≤ 1, no tracking if -1)
        button - Button states (0, 1)
        joystick - Joystick values (-1 ≤ joystick ≤ 1)
        loc - Location (in [mm])
        rot - Rotation matrix (3x3-dimensional)

      • getButton

        public int[] getButton()
        Returns state of buttons.
        Returns:
        Button state (1 - Pressed, 0 - Not pressed):
        • 0 - Front
        • 1...n-1 - Right to left

        public double[] getJoystick()
        Returns state of joystick values.
        Returns:

        • 0 - Horizontal
        • 1 - Vertical
